rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows to let in natural light, built according to Vastu principles. Open space allows easy flow of energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the entrance hall featuring colonial design aesthetics and large windows for ample daylight.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and connected via an open plan layout. Features a colonial dining table and lighting fixtures that follow Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Lavish master suite with an ensuite bathroom and dressing area; designed for restful sleep in accordance to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with attached bathroom for visitors, positioned according to local norms and Vastu orientation.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool
additional_features.description: Outdoor swimming pool designed with colonial style and integrated into the landscape.
